column2: §RTides of Warcraft§!: Interbreeding
Only certain racial pairings can result in pregnancies.
column3: Only certain racial pairings can result in pregnancies.
column4: Only certain racial pairings can result in pregnancies.
column6: Only certain racial pairings can result in pregnancies.

column2: Any pairing can result in pregnancies and children, regardless of race.
column3: Any pairing can result in pregnancies and children, regardless of race.
column4: Any pairing can result in pregnancies and children, regardless of race.
column6: Any pairing can result in pregnancies and children, regardless of race.

column2: Only couples of the same race can produce children.
column3: Only couples of the same race can produce children.
column4: Only couples of the same race can produce children.
column6: Only couples of the same race can produce children.

column2: §RTides of Warcraft§!: Infinite Dragonflight
The Infinite Dragonflight will, very rarely, attempt to meddle with the timeline.
The Infinite Dragonflight will act more often.
Infinite dragons won't appear outside extremely specific circumstances
Tides of Warcraft
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Story Events
The story events will happen as normal.
Alternate History
The story events will more often diverge from canon.
The story events will not happen.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: War of Three Hammers Story Events
The story events for the War of Three Hammers bookmark will happen as normal.
The story events for the War of Three Hammers bookmark will more often diverge from canon.
The story events for the War of Three Hammers bookmark will not happen.

The story events for the First War bookmark will happen as normal.
The story events for the First War bookmark will more often diverge from canon.
The story events for the First War bookmark will not happen.

The story events for the Second War bookmark will more often diverge from canon.
The story events for the Second War bookmark will not happen.

The story events for the Third War bookmark will more often diverge from canon.
The story events for the Third War bookmark will not happen.

The story events for theAge of Adventurers bookmark will more often diverge from canon.

§RTides of Warcraft§!: Religion Restrictions
Certain religions have specific requirements, and the religion of characters may be modified as needed.
With a few exceptions, there is no restriction on religion.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Government Restrictions
Certain governments have specific requirements, and the government of characters may be modified as needed.
The restrictions on governments are more relaxed.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Culture Restrictions
Certain cultures have specific requirements, and the culture of characters may be modified as needed.
With a few exceptions, there is no restriction on culture.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Corruption Speed
Corruption happens at default speed.
Corruption happens at half the default speed.
Corruption happens at twice the default speed.
Slower
Faster
§RTides of Warcraft§!:  Class Requirements
Classes are restricted to specific races and/or religions.
Unrestricted
Classes have no race or religion requirements.
§RTides of Warcraft§!:  Class Opinions
Certain characters will react positively or negatively towards members of certain classes.
Opinions will not change based on a character's class. Specific classes will also never be persecuted.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Fel Wasteland Restoration
Fel Wastelands are beyond saving.
Slow
Fel Wastelands can slowly be purified.
Fel Wastelands recover somewhat faster.
Gender
Amandable
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Night Elves Gender Restriction
Night Elves will always favor women over men.
Night Elves will favor women over men by default but can change their tolerance with laws.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Trolls Gender Restriction
Trolls will always favor men over women.
Trolls will favor men over women by default but can change their tolerance with laws.
Trolls will not favor any gender over the other but can change their tolerance with laws.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Orcs Gender Restriction
Orcs will always favor men over women.
Orcs will favor men over women by default but can change their tolerance with laws.
Orcs will not favor any gender over the other but can change their tolerance with laws.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Ogres Gender Restriction
Ogres will always favor men over women.
Ogres will favor men over women by default but can change their tolerance with laws.
Ogres will not favor any gender over the other but can change their tolerance with laws.
Editable
Cosmetic
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Society Clothes Display
The society clothes will be displayed with the same behavior as in the original game.
Players can choose to remove their society clothes.
§RTides of Warcraft§!: Headgear Display
Headgear will be displayed with the same behavior as in the original game.
Players can choose to remove their headgear.
